mapper.select: SELECT bb.fund_code AS fund_code, --基金代码 bb.fund_name AS fund_name, --基金名称 bb.title AS title, --基金公告 bb.publish_date AS publish_date, --发布日期 bb.nums AS nums --基金公告记录数 FROM (SELECT aa.*, ROWNUM AS rn FROM (SELECT tfn.*, COUNT(1) OVER(PARTITION BY tfn.fund_code) AS nums FROM t_fund_notice tfn WHERE tfn.fund_code = #{fund_code} ORDER BY tfn.publish_date DESC) aa WHERE ROWNUM <= #{end_number}) bb WHERE bb.rn >= #{start_number}
